description: Twins with telekinetic abilities. A bit childlike and irresponsible, but always cheerful. They are also skilled engineers and mecha pilots; their mechas corresponds with their telekinetic abilities. As Dianiella`s attendants, they were put in charge of "babysitting" Age, but are often involved in Age`s childish antics. When Iolaus is depressed, they sell him pictures of Dianiella.
name: Mail Al Mehelim
